items.title: HUL: Value unlocking on the cards after ice cream business demerger
items.description: The high-growth, but low-margin category contributes only 3 percent to HUL’s turnover and needs significant investments.

items.title: India Inc raises concerns about growth, wages and demand
items.description: Slowing demand, shrinking middle class, inflation and hope for a better year-end dominated the minds of CXOs in their assessment of the Indian economy.
